market_context: X/Twitter sentiment analysis shows bearish bias in retail investor chatter, contrarian indicator. Crypto markets surging — BTC above 98K suggests risk appetite. Short interest building in small caps.

predictions.reasoning: X sentiment is overwhelmingly bearish right now — classic contrarian setup. Crypto rally signals institutional risk appetite is intact. Smart money tends to fade retail panic.

Bitcoin above 98K directly benefits Coinbase revenue via trading fees and custody. Crypto sentiment on X is euphoric and accelerating. Momentum trades in crypto-adjacent stocks typically amplify BTC moves.
AI chip discourse on X is at fever pitch. Multiple datacenter build announcements trending. Options flow data shows heavy call buying ahead of the earnings catalyst next week.
Tech narrative dominating market discussion. No clear negative catalyst for the week. Gamma exposure data suggests market makers are positioned to support prices near current levels.
Tesla short interest very high — any positive news could trigger a short squeeze. X community remains divided but Musk engagement driving eyeballs. Robotaxi timeline updates expected.
